title: Ocean View Delight
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Mediterranean, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. At this beachside Mediterranean kitchen and grill, the owner makes effort to cater to vegans and vegetarians and has created a separate vegan menu which features a veggie burger, veggie platters, and veggie wraps. Choices include house-made hummus, lentil soup, a platter of eggplant, avocado, hummus, olives, and cucumber. Casual with free Wi-Fi. Confirmed open, Oct 2014.
